title: Am I the only one whose now half terrified of ranked?
body:
Title.

After the devourer patch, I've slowly just gotten more and more scared to play ranked.  It's like I can't play more than 2 games at a time for some reason.  Even when I win, after the game I just feel like next game I'm going to lose because of the assortment of champions that are excruciatingly painful to play against.  In champ select I have to beg for shyvana skarner and vayne to be banned, and that still leaves a lot of champs I wish could be banned but I can't ban, and when the enemy picks them I instantly feel dread in my stomach and feel like I should dodge.  I want to play but am so worried that if I hop into champ select the enemy will pick vayne and then the game is ruined, so i just start flipping through boards or youtube or watch another episode of Rizzoli and Isles.  I don't know why, I've never felt this way about League in the year I've been playing up until now.  I just wanted to know if anyone else felt the same.
